thread.title: Union calls for full investigation into Housing Authority
thread.title_full: Union calls for full investigation into Housing Authority - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Union calls for full investigation into Housing Authority
text: Union leader Glenard S. Middleton called for a "full investigation" Thursday into the Housing Authority of Baltimore City, following allegations some maintenance workers demanded sex from female residents to make repairs. Middleton, director of Maryland Council 67 of the American Federation of... ...
